tool_description: Introducing a powerful and efficient API that transforms URLs  into high-quality QR codes (Quick Response codes). QR codes are advanced 2D barcodes that can be scanned with a smartphone or a QR code reader, enabling quick access to information. Whether you're looking to enhance your marketing efforts or streamline your business processes, our API is the perfect solution for all your QR code needs.
name: QRLink API
title: QRLink API

api_list.name: URL to QR code
api_list.description: This endpoint is a GET request that takes a single parameter "url" which specifies the website URL. The endpoint generates a QR code image using the input URL and the response is downloadable.
